synopsis: The hero was an orphan who grew up in an orphanage. After finishing high school, he decided to become a hero and join the prestigious Hero Training Academy to learn their skills and techniques. Upon arrival, he realized this was no ordinary school as it was filled with magical creatures and had students who had superpowers. The villain had kidnapped many innocent civilians and held them in cages as slaves, and his goal was to create an army of mindless monsters. Despite being constantly bullied and insulted by fellow students, the hero fought his way through the academy and defeated the villain and his goons. With his newfound abilities, the hero vowed to avenge the deaths of his friends and to stop the villain from terrorizing the world.
